duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate sexuality education workshops and community outreach to youth.
Maintain curriculum fidelity and ensure adherence to PPGNY’s mission and values.
Collect demographic and evaluation data from workshop participants and compile data appropriately.
Stay current on research related to sexuality and reproductive health.
Help to identify articles to be read by other Education and Training staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Public Health, Education, or related field
